Summary: irregularly shiny and didn't have airplane features
divs: sighting detailsi was going with my dad, my uncle, and my brother to hibiscus island to play tennis with my uncle's friend. i was talking to my brother in the car on our way in the highway. my uncle was driving. my dad was in the passenger seat. we were near the airport and i was looking out the window and i see an "airplane" in the sky over some buildings to my right. i didn't tell the people in the car at first that it looked weird in a way. the plane, to begin, was very shiny. it reflected the sunlight more than i've ever seen any plane reflect. also, its color was a silver\gold that, again, shone a lot, and i never had seen an airplane of that color. it was also a little too long to be a plane. i thought it was a plane, thinking logically. that was until i noticed something...the object didnt have a tail like airplanes do. it didnt have wings either, which i thought i couldn't see because it was facing sideways towards me. also, no windows or pilot cabin. it was just a disk with no shape whatsoever sticking out of it, that just seemed to float in the air. it also had squares on it. it's hard to explain. it was like a quilt...the ufo was built with metal squares which i could notice. again, it's hard to explain. at that moment i felt like something squeezed my heart, just like you feels when you think you lost something very important or when you get really scared. i pointed the object out to the people in the car. i said "look at that plane it looks so much like an alien!"(except i said it in spanish). at that moment, a wall appeared covering the object, so they couldn't see it. it was a wall in the highway. i've seen many in highways in miami, and just at that exact moment the wall had to cover the object. by the time the wall was over, which actually was not very much at all because tehre was no traffic, the object was gone. like it never existed. i personally think it's impossible for an airplane to get to the airport, which was still not that close, that fast. maybe it was a plane, but i know what i saw and i'm sure it was not a plane. i wanted to draw a sketch of what i saw but i had nothing to draw on, and we were on our way to having a good time playing tennis so i didn't want to ruin it making a fuss about it. after that i didnt talk about it, and i still haven't because i'm scared my parents might think i'm crazy since i'm the only one who saw the ufo. i can't get what i saw out of my head. this is why now i decided to look for a place to report it. before this i believed in aliens, but i doubted it. now i'm scared. again, the "obvious" reason for what the object was is a plane since the airport was near, but it wasn't close enough for the plane to get there and land that fast. and also, the thing had no tail! planes have tails!! but ok i personally think if i read this random post of a ufo report by a teenager i'd think it's a little dumb child trying to call attention, but i know what i saw. **i alrealdy made a report, and in the last one i put that it happened around 1pm...then i remembered that it was around 11 am because at around 1pm we were setting up the last round of tennis matches. so in this report i fixed it**
